topic.title: Pause/resume replication
topic.shortdesc: XDCR replication can be paused and resumed using the Couchbase Web Console.

body.p: DCR streams between the source and destination cluster can be paused and later resumed.
After XDCR is resumed, data continues to replicate between the source and destination clusters starting from where it previously left off.
To pause and resume replication, click the replicating and paused icons under the ongoing replication status.

ol.li: Using the Couchbase Web Console, navigate to XDCR.
Under Ongoing Replication Status , click on the Replicating icon to pause replication.
Under Ongoing Replication Status , click on the Paused triangle icon to continue replicating.
